title: Stamford Health On Call Care
description:
Connect face to face with a doctor, right from home, right on your phone or tablet, in just a few minutes. If you’re feeling under the weather but aren’t up for taking a trip to the doctor’s office, Stamford Health On Call Care has you covered.

Who are the doctors?
Stamford Health On Call Care physicians are all board-certified and licensed in treating a variety of conditions. The doctors come from diverse backgrounds with at least 5 years of experience.

How does it work?
Just as if you were seeing your doctor in person, a Stamford Health On Call Care doctor will perform an exam and even recommend treatment and bloodwork if needed. If you require a prescription, your doctor will call in your medication to the pharmacy of your choice.

What do Stamford Health On Call Care doctors treat?
Our doctors treat many common conditions including:
• Allergies
• Cold/cough/fever
• Neck/back pain
• Headache
• Rash/skin infection
• Urine infection
• Vomiting/diarrhea
• Yeast infection (women)

Who can be treated?
All adults, 18 and over, and children, 2 and over, can be seen by Stamford Health On Call Care doctors.

What about nights, weekends and holidays?
Because sicknesses can come at any time, our doctors are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, all 365 days of the year, including weekends and holidays.

Is there a copay?
Yes. Stamford Health On Call Care will take your copay before your visit and your credit card will be charged after your visit is complete.

What if it’s an emergency?
If you’re experiencing a true emergency, please call 9-1-1.

summary: Connect face to face with a doctor right on your phone or tablet, right away.
summaryHTML: Connect face to face with a doctor right on your phone or tablet, right away.
recentChanges:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
• Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed
recentChangesHTML:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
• Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed
comments: This was my first time using app. It was very easy. It was much easier then going into the office where I would have the same outcome.
Very clear video. And got my prescription filled right away after talking to the doctor. Very efficient. Only issue is they could not test the vitals obviously
Good but video/audio a little choppy. No settings to fine tune audio/video.
Easy to use, as effective as a in person visit.
